data.meta_description: Where is Brindisi, Apulia, Italy on map with latitude and longitude gps coordinates are given in both decimal degrees and DMS format, see where Brindisi, Apulia, Italy is located on the map.
data.text:
Brindisi, Apulia, Italy

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 40.633331, 17.933332.

Brindisi is a small city situated in the south easternmost part of Italian peninsula, in the region known as Apulia. It is the capital of the same name province and an old and very beautiful city. According to one of the legends, the city was established by the epic Diomedes during the times of the Greeks ruling the area around the Mediterranean Sea. During the Middle Ages the city suffered plenty of devastating events including wars, earthquakes, epidemics, etc. Modern day's Brindisi is a center of culture, education, and tourism, with an impressive number of museums, palaces, cathedrals, libraries, churches, mansions, old buildings, squares, etc. Besides, the city is known for its special cuisine, with very old traditions of producing cheese, pasta, almond milk, wines, confectionery, various desserts, and so on.
